recipesJson.name: Caramel bread pudding
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: This is a perfect caramel bread pudding in my opinion. Its an all Flavorah recipe so in my opinion the steep time is much less because of it being all Flavorah flavors. I think its good to vape after it settles overnight and is at its best after 3 days. If you like bread pudding then I dare to say you will love this. Not to mention all of these flavors are good highly concentrated flavors that are all worth having in your arsenal.

reviews.text: Very enjoyable recipe that doesn't require a long cure. I did add .5% cap super sweet and .5% tpa butter.
